name: Cleaning Crew Prototype
description:
A very basic prototype for a game I'm currently working on. As of right now you can play around with the 4 weapons I've added to put some holes in the shooting range.

IMPORTANT as far as I know if a controller is plugged in this messes up the camera a lot. So if you're experiencing problems, and a controller is plugged in, first try to unplug that and see if the issues are fixed.

Controls:
Press Escape to see all of the controls for the game.

If you'd like, leave a comment and let me know what you think of what I have so far! I know it's not much right now but I'm at the point where I'd love to hear any input :)

As of my plans now for the game I'm going to be completely redoing how I handle the player/weapon animations. Making it where you'll be able to see all of your characters body.
